mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT( COMMENT_ID, PARENT_ID, AUTHOR_ID, ARTICLE_ID, CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{comment.commentId}, #{comment.parentId}, #{comment.authorId}, #{comment.articleId}, #{comment.content} )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_ID AS commentId, PARENT_ID AS parentId, AUTHOR_ID AS authorId, ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, CONTENT AS content, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM COMMENT ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC

SELECT COMMENT_ID AS commentId, PARENT_ID AS parentId, AUTHOR_ID AS authorId, ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, CONTENT AS content, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM COMMENT WHERE ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC
SELECT COMMENT_ID AS commentId, PARENT_ID AS parentId, AUTHOR_ID AS authorId, ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, CONTENT AS content, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_ID = #{commentId}
SELECT COMMENT_ID AS commentId, AUTHOR_ID AS authorId, ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, CONTENT AS content, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM COMMENT ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT 1
